verses.verse: וַיְהִ֡י <S%H1961><s%> happened לְעֵת֩ <S%H6256><s%> And it came to pass that after תְּשׁוּבַ֨ת <S%H8666><s%> was expired הַשָּׁנָ֜ה <S%H8141><s%> the year לְעֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H6256><s%> at the time צֵ֣את <S%H3318><s%> go out הַמְּלָכִ֗ים <S%H4428><s%> that kings וַיִּנְהַ֣ג <S%H5090><s%> led forth יוֹאָב֩ <S%H3097><s%> [to battle] Joab אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֵ֨יל <S%H2426><s%> army הַצָּבָ֜א <S%H6635><s%> of the army וַיַּשְׁחֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H7843><s%> and wasted אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the country בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּ֗וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> and came וַיָּ֣צַר <S%H6696><s%> and besieged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רַבָּ֔ה <S%H7237><s%> Rabbah וְדָוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> But David יֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> tarried בִּירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem וַיַּ֥ךְ <S%H5221><s%> smote יוֹאָ֛ב <S%H3097><s%> And Joab אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רַבָּ֖ה <S%H7237><s%> Rabbah וַיֶּֽהֶרְסֶֽהָ׃ <S%H2040><s%> and destroyed

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲטֶֽרֶת־ <S%H5850><s%> the crown מַלְכָּם֩ <S%H4428><s%> of their king מֵעַ֨ל <S%H5921><s%> from רֹאשׁ֜וֹ <S%H7218><s%> from off his head וַֽיִּמְצָאָ֣הּ ׀ <S%H4672><s%> and found מִשְׁקַ֣ל <S%H4948><s%> it to weigh כִּכַּר־ <S%H3603><s%> a talent זָהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וּבָהּ֙ אֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> stones יְקָרָ֔ה <S%H3368><s%> and [there were] precious וַתְּהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> placed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> head דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> in it and it was set upon David's וּשְׁלַ֥ל <S%H7998><s%> spoil הָעִ֛יר <S%H5892><s%> out of the city הוֹצִ֖יא <S%H3318><s%> and he brought הַרְבֵּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> much מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> also exceeding

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֨ם <S%H5971><s%> the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּ֜הּ הוֹצִ֗יא <S%H3318><s%> And he brought out וַיָּ֨שַׂר <S%H7787><s%> that [were] in it and cut בַּמְּגֵרָ֜ה <S%H4050><s%> [them] with saws וּבַחֲרִיצֵ֤י <S%H2757><s%> and with harrows הַבַּרְזֶל֙ <S%H1270><s%> of iron וּבַמְּגֵר֔וֹת <S%H4050><s%> and with axes וְכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> and thus יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> Even so dealt דָוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> David לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> to all עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> with all the cities בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּ֑וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וַיָּ֧שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> returned דָּוִ֛יד <S%H1732><s%> And David וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem פ

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came אַחֲרֵיכֵ֔ן <S%H310><s%> And it came to pass after this וַתַּעֲמֹ֧ד <S%H5975><s%> that there arose מִלְחָמָ֛ה <S%H4421><s%> war בְּגֶ֖זֶר <S%H1507><s%> at Gezer עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> with the Philistines אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> at which time הִכָּ֞ה <S%H5221><s%> slew סִבְּכַ֣י <S%H5444><s%> Sibbechai הַחֻֽשָׁתִ֗י <S%H2843><s%> the Hushathite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סִפַּ֛י <S%H5598><s%> Sippai מִילִדֵ֥י <S%H3211><s%> [that was] of the children הָרְפָאִ֖ים <S%H7497><s%> of the giant וַיִּכָּנֵֽעוּ׃ <S%H3665><s%> and they were subdued

וַתְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again מִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> And there was war אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> again with the Philistines וַיַּ֞ךְ <S%H5221><s%> slew אֶלְחָנָ֣ן <S%H445><s%> and Elhanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son [יָעוּר כ] (יָעִ֗יר <S%H3265><s%> Jair ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לַחְמִי֙ <S%H3902><s%> Lahmi אֲחִי֙ <S%H251><s%> the brother גָּלְיָ֣ת <S%H1555><s%> of Goliath הַגִּתִּ֔י <S%H1663><s%> the Gittite וְעֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> staff חֲנִית֔וֹ <S%H2595><s%> whose spear כִּמְנ֖וֹר <S%H4500><s%> beam אֹרְגִֽים׃ <S%H707><s%> [was] like a weaver's

וַתְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> Again מִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> And yet again there was war בְּגַ֑ת <S%H1661><s%> at Gath וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> there was אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> where was a man מִדָּ֗ה <S%H4060><s%> of [great] stature וְאֶצְבְּעֹתָ֤יו <S%H676><s%> whose fingers שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> six וָשֵׁשׁ֙ <S%H8337><s%> [on each hand] and six עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty וְאַרְבַּ֔ע <S%H702><s%> [were] four וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נוֹלַ֥ד <S%H3205><s%> [on each foot] and he also was the son לְהָרָפָֽא׃ <S%H7497><s%> of the giant

וַיְחָרֵ֖ף <S%H2778><s%> But when he defied אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וַיַּכֵּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H5221><s%> slew יְה֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <S%H3083><s%> Jonathan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שִׁמְעָ֖א <S%H8092><s%> of Shimea אֲחִ֥י <S%H251><s%> brother דָוִֽיד׃ <S%H1732><s%> David's

אֵ֛ל <S%H411><s%> These נוּלְּד֥וּ <S%H3205><s%> were born לְהָרָפָ֖א <S%H7497><s%> unto the giant בְּגַ֑ת <S%H1661><s%> in Gath וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> and they fell בְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> of David וּבְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> and by the hand עֲבָדָֽיו׃ <S%H5650><s%> of his servants פ
